200.body:
! Microsoft Corporation
! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
! Sample VPN tunnel configuration template for IOS-based devices
!
! This configuration template applies to Cisco VPN devices running IOS 15.1 or beyond (ISR or ASR)
!


		

! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
! ACL rules
!
! Some VPN devices require explicit ACL rules to allow cross-premises traffic:
!
! 1. Allow traffic between on premises address ranges and VNet address ranges
! 2. Allow IKE traffic (UDP:500) between on premises VPN devices and Azure VPN gateway
! 3. Allow IPsec traffic (Proto:ESP) between on premises VPN devices and Azure VPN gateway
!
		
access-list 101 permit ip 10.1.0.0 0.0.255.255 10.0.0.0 0.0.255.255

! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
! Internet Key Exchange (IKE) configuration
!
! This section specifies the authentication, encryption, hashing, and Diffie-Hellman group parameters for IKE
! main mode or phase 1
!

crypto ikev2 proposal SwaggerS2S-proposal
  encryption DES3
  integrity  SHA384
  group      DHGroup24
  lifetime   3600
 exit

crypto ikev2 policy SwaggerS2S-policy
  proposal SwaggerS2S-proposal
  exit

crypto ikev2 keyring SwaggerBranch-keyring
		
		peer 52.173.199.254
		address        52.173.199.254
		pre-shared-key lALEHuppeopJmA94exRNiRr2QzuZ6lOsvzu5IlJUEA6LthbTc8g5MTT86MCsGNMzGkTAaLuLnEJoD1Cn4cIlr94qKZm9drsgllzWvsPNezS71stAkaW1Bb7h6GBnDlDP
  exit

crypto ikev2 profile  SwaggerS2S-profile
  match address  local 10.3.0.0
	match identity remote address 52.173.199.254 255.255.255.255
		
  authentication remote pre-share
  authentication local  pre-share
  keyring        SwaggerBranch-keyring
  exit

! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
! IPsec configuration
!
! This section specifies encryption, authentication, tunnel mode properties for the Phase 2 negotiation
!
crypto ipsec transform-set SwaggerS2S-TransformSet DES3 DES3
 mode  tunnel
 exit

! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
! Crypto map configuration
!
! This section defines a crypto profile that binds the cross-premises network traffic to the IPsec and IKE
! policy profiles for this connection. Then defines the VTI (virtual tunnel interface) with the crypto
! profile. A random interface number (tunnel 1) was used with a random link local address (169.254.0.1/28)
! for the tunnel interface. If either selection is already used in the VPN device, please select another
! interface number or address.  The only requirement is that they must not overlap with another interface
! on the same VPN device.
!
crypto ipsec profile SwaggerS2S-IPsecProfile
  set transform-set  SwaggerS2S-TransformSet
  set ikev2-profile  SwaggerS2S-profile
  set pfs            None
  set security-association lifetime 3600
 exit


int tunnel 52.173.199.254
  ip address 169.254.0.1 255.255.255.252
  ip tcp adjust-mss 1350
  tunnel source 10.3.0.0
  tunnel mode ipsec ipv4
  tunnel destination 52.173.199.254
  tunnel protection ipsec profile SwaggerS2S-IPsecProfile
  exit

	ip route 10.0.0.0 255.255.0.0 tunnel 52.173.199.254
